text: The Everyday Sexism Project is a website started by feminist writer Laura Bates. Bates started the project after she was sexually harassed on public transport in London. On April 10, 2014, a book about the project called Everyday Sexism will be published. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Everyday Sexism Project Category:2012 establishments Category:Feminism
title: Everyday Sexism Project
